properties.description: Copy data from Landing to Staging

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['landing/*'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> landingStream
landingStream select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(name = toString(byName('name')),
		mpg = toString(byName('mpg')),
		cyl = toString(byName('cyl')),
		disp = toString(byName('disp')),
		hp = toString(byName('hp')),
		drat = toString(byName('drat')),
		wt = toString(byName('wt')),
		qsec = toString(byName('qsec')),
		vs = toString(byName('vs')),
		am = toString(byName('am')),
		gear = toString(byName('gear'),byName('gear')),
		carb = toString(byName('carb')),
		extraCol = toString(multiply(toFloat(byName('gear')),toFloat(byName('carb'))))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
